title: Motley Fool Money: 05.02.2014
description: The government reports surprising employment numbers.  Ford and Yum name new CEOs. LinkedIn fails to connect.  And Coach falls out of fashion.  We discuss those stories and talk creativity with Pixar President Ed Catmull.
content:encoded: The government reports surprising employment numbers.  Ford and Yum name new CEOs. LinkedIn fails to connect.  And Coach falls out of fashion.  We discuss those stories and talk creativity with Pixar President Ed Catmull.
